welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zunil, Guatemala! Get ready to experience the charming and vibrant culture of our city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and rich traditions. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zunil has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Quetzaltenango Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quiche Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.
